DOC.brief_summary: This randomize clinical trial study nurse intervention support family caregiver ( FCs ) patient undergo stem cell transplant . A nursing intervention may help prepare FCs support recovery patient
DOC.brief_title: Nursing Intervention Supporting Family Caregivers Patients Undergoing Stem Cell Transplant
DOC.detailed_description: PRIMARY OBJECTIVES : I . Test effect advance practice nursing ( APN ) intervention family caregiver ( FCs ) hematopoietic cell transplant ( HCT ) patient experimental group FC quality life , psychological distress , caregiver burden , caregiver skill preparedness compare FCs control group . II . Describe self-care behavior FCs HCT patient compare experimental control group . III . Describe resource use FCs compare experimental control group . IV . Identify subgroups FCs benefit family caregiver intervention ( FCI ) relation sociodemographic characteristic , caregiver health status , patient characteristic . SECONDARY OBJECTIVES : I . Describe family caregiver ' satisfaction FCI . OUTLINE : FCs randomize 1 2 group . GROUP I : FCs receive 4 session APN FCI begin admission transplant continue 100 day transplant . GROUP II : FCs receive standard supportive care . After completion study , FCs follow 3 , 6 , 12 month .
